messages.title: What They Say
messages.content: Quotes from Phil Woolas MP, Eric Pickles MP, and Rt Hon David Cameron MP endorsing Greg Knight.

messages.title: Greg's Pledges
messages.content: Pledges include addressing violent crime, immigration reductions, support for David Cameron's plans for a referendum on Europe, NHS campaign, rural broadband initiatives, saving pubs, and supporting the state pension freeze.

messages.title: NHS Labour have let us down says Greg
messages.content: Concern about the state of local health services, with a pledge to continue campaigning for the retention and return of local health services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aim to address violent crime which is up under Labour. Pledges to implement knife crime prevention measures with more street patrols and make violent crime carry a prison sentence.
Plans to significantly reduce immigration, supporting David Cameron's stance.
Wants a referendum on Europe and an audit of the costs and benefits of UK membership.
Promises hard work in securing the future of local hospitals in Bridlington and at Driffield. Aims to address labour's failings in NHS.
Campaign to extend broadband coverage to the rural parts of East Riding.
Aims to support struggling pubs, especially those in rural areas, with a mention of celebrity chef Anthony Worrall Thompson's involvement.
Supports the state pension being increased in line with earnings to reverse pensioners' reliance on means testing. Backs a two-year freeze on Council Tax plans.

issues.brexitEurope: Wants a referendum on Europe and an audit of the costs and benefits of UK membership.
issues.economy: Supports a two-year freeze on Council Tax plans. Rural broadband initiatives mentioned as contributing to economic support.
issues.environment: Campaign to save local pubs which often serve as community hubs.
issues.governance: Support for David Cameron’s plans and governance.
issues.health: Calls for the retention and improvement of local health services, criticizes Labour's handling of the NHS.
issues.immigration: Plans to significantly reduce the levels of immigration.
issues.socialWelfare: Support for increasing the state pension in line with earnings.

endorsements.endorsement: Greg has impeccable judgement which is of great value, both to the party and to the House of Commons.

endorsements.endorser: Eric Pickles MP, Chairman of the Conservative Party
endorsements.endorsement: Greg is a magnificent MP and he has impeccable judgement which is of great value, both to the party and to the House of Commons.
Greg Knight works very hard for you, both in East Yorkshire and at the House of Commons. He is an excellent MP.

quotes.text: I pay a lot of attention to what he says because my experience is that he makes thoughtful and correct amendments.
Greg Knight works very hard for you, both in East Yorkshire and at the House of Commons. He is an excellent MP.

images.caption: Photos related to campaign themes; Greg Knight with constituents, a protest for NHS, Greg Knight with Anthony Worrall Thompson, and Greg Knight at a pension event.
